title: People Heard You Scream at Kinect - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.22.19
description:
Andrea and Greg talk about contractors listening to your Kinect commands, GameStop stock, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
New Party Mode today! Borderlands 3 Proving Grounds!
PAX is next week! Guild Wars event Friday morning, KFGShowcase Friday at 4:30, Inter-Site Championship Saturday at 9! kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:06:00 - Xbox One Was Spying on you?! Joseph Cox @ Motherboard at Vice
00:17:28 - GameStop Stock Bump, Fred Imbert @ CNBC
00:23:34 Best Friend Q. - Will Gamestop be around in 5 years - The Virtual boy
00:25:45 -  Alloy Comes back to Monster Hunter in Iceborne, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
00:26:55 Best Friend Q. - Aloy from Horizon Zero Dawn is coming to Monster Hunter World Iceborne. Does this make you excited to play the DLC? What is your dream crossover character? - GameJumperX
00:29:40 - Out today
00:35:15 -  Morning Shows
Reader mail   -
00:37:02 - What are your opinions on game demos being exclusive to trade shows and conventions? - Ignacio Rojas
00:43:37 - Are we seeing the beginning of the content wars in the video game industry? - Parker Petrov
00:48:10 - Squad Up:Cory from Tech Geek Gamers(PS4) - clean_mod
00:49:52 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Imran Khan
